Good Comments: Romanized Japanese during a song without a translation? Really? Skip dialogue much?... -.-
Bad Comments: Quality release, with no obvious translation errors.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: D.C.II S.S.: Da Capo II Second Season

Good Comments: Best subs! Accurate TL and editing! High-Quality video!
Flawless audio/visual quality, with great translation and typesetting. ^_^
They started slow but now are picking up. Great susb and all, get theirs and ignore the Chihiro trolls fakesubs.

nice sub style and decent enough but some mistakes that you just can´t stop noticing like this line: but you're so great, Wataru-kun. you can found them so quickly. (that later part is obviously wrong)
Bad Comments: Better than Chihiro, but that's hardly a complement. Translation is basically correct, but you have to wade through a swamp of unnatural constructions, tense shifts, and other grammatical issues.
They were slow, but their translations are a lot better than Chihiro's, and they also did a much more thorough job with it.

There were several editing errors throughout the series with awkward phrasing, misspellings, and missing words that broke the flow of the narration. And using the regional term "steamboat" for "nabe" instead of the general term “hot pot” was jarring.
Best out there. Of course it's it ideal translation, because they localized many things unfortunately. But they are using honorifics at least.

Good Comments: Will need a v2 to fix some of the encode errors, but all is well other than that.
Flawless audio/visual quality, with great translation and typesetting. ^_^
Best choice. Honorifics, accurate and rather direct  translation, everything is done like it should be.
Bad Comments: Awkward writing, names often not changed to "you" where normal English demands it. Eps 1 & 7 100% hardsubbed for random reasons.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Macross F Movie 1: Itsuwari no Utahime

Good Comments: Watchable subs, small mistakes here and there + no karaoke effects ^^' but was nice and readable on my tv screen.

Bad Comments: Guchoku != Guchuko. 田舎のおばあちゃん means her grandmother who lives in the countryside. いなか is not her name.

Good Comments: Accurate subtitling. Though slow, they're good and don't add in unescessary text.
Bad Comments: good subs although its taking a while for them to release a new ep
a lot of untranslated lines, awful font and poor English
Good editing, except for the fact that they leave honorifics in.

Good Comments: They dropped this Project with episode 2,unfortunally...,(ZnT ~PnR~ is licensed in the US)but I heard that SS-Eclipse won't stop the release. well, let's hope for that.
